info.name: w3 schools dark subtle
info.description: blue/orange dark theme for w3 schools
info.additionalInfo:
built off of another w3 schools dark theme, but don't remember which. source code editing is also dark This below may need to be added manually: 
@-moz-document url("https://www.w3schools.com/"), url-prefix("https://www.w3schools.com/angular/"), regexp(".+w3schools.+\\.asp") 
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);
